div.head: 玉莖強硬不痿
div.div: hardness of the jade stalk and failure to return to dysfunction

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Yu jing qiang ying bu wei

entry.def: hardness of the jade stalk and failure to return to dysfunction

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yu jing bu wei 韭：玉莖強中：玉莖強硬不痿，精流不住，時時如針 刺，捏之則痛，其病名強中，乃腎滯漏疾也 , failure of the jade stalk to return to dysfunction. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jiu 韭：玉莖強中：玉莖強硬不痿，精流不住，時時如針 刺，捏之則痛，其病名強中，乃腎滯漏疾也 , “Hardness of the jade stalk in the center: When the jade stalk is hard and fails to return to dysfunction , with unceasing spontaneous seminal pollution, often accompanied by a feeling as if pierced with a needle. Pinching it generates pain. This disease is called ‘hardened center’. This is an ailment of sluggish and leaking kidney [qi]”.
